feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX2][Dedicated Servers] - 31A13 - 31A14 - 31A16
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 6, 23:00 UTC  -  Feb 7, 06:00 UTC

Jan 4, 17:30 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 06/02/2024 23:00 UTC
End time : 07/02/2024 06:00 UTC
Service impact : The servers will be unreachable during operations (30 minutes per server)
Service improvement : Our teams will migrate the servers in the 31A13 - 31A14 - 31A16 rack to the rack 31A05 - 31A06.

entry.title: [RBX4/RBX6/RBX7/RBX8/BHS4/BHS5/BHS6/BH7][Dedicated Servers] - Boot Firmware Maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 17, 10:00 - 10:59 UTC

Jan 4, 17:23 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 17/01/2024 10:00 UTC
End time : 17/01/2024 10:59 UTC
Service impact : This maintenance affect reboots to disk or in rescue mode for servers running very old hardware
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our servers, we will be changing the boot firmware of legacy boot servers in RBX4, RBX6, RBX7, RBX8, BHS4, BHS5, BHS6, and BHS7 from SYSLINUX to iPXE.

entry.title: [RBX7][Dedicated Servers] - R710B09/R710B08
entry.content:
Jan 4, 15:04 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 04/01/2024 11:30 UTC
End time : 04/01/2024 15:02 UTC
Root cause : Electrical disjunction
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jan 4, 13:45 UTC
Update - New rack impacted : R710A21
Start time : 04/01/2024 13:17 UTC
Service impact : All the servers are unreachable in this rack.

Jan 4, 12:39 UTC
Update - Rack impacted : R710B09
End time : 04/01/2024 12:26 UTC
Service impact : The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.

Jan 4, 12:35 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jan 4, 12:07 UTC
Update - New rack impacted : R710B08
Start time : 04/01/2024 11:51 UTC
Service impact : All the servers are unreachable in this rack.

Jan 4, 11:40 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 04/01/2024 11:30 UTC
Service impact : All the servers are unreachable in this rack.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [RBX7/8][Storage and Backups] - NAS HA maintenance notification
entry.content:
Jan 3, 08:59 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jan 3, 05:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 12, 23:06 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/01/2024 05:30 UTC
End time : 03/01/2024 07:30 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will perform an update on the storage servers hosting your data.
This version will improve certain security mechanisms, as well as some performance enhancements.
During the maintenance period, your data will remain available.
